title: The Kremlin in Turmol after Clinton applied for asylum "urgent and immediate"
subtitle: He claims that the former CEO of the Clinton Eric Braverman Foundation sought asylum in Russia, created with the site of a fake news conspiracy, is not "missing."

vclaim: The former CEO of the Clinton Eric Braverman Foundation sought asylum in Russia after the Wikileaks documents revealed him as a spy.
